"A.P.242/3/10/12:00": "This place sure brings back memories. I never imagined we would have to protect it again."
"The location where I once invoked the Braided Ash Formation. I will send you there."
"You are to intercept the enemies and protect the keystone. Defend it with your lives, until they appear."
"The enemies should notice your arrival and gather at once. So too should that rogue, before long."
"Precisely. It is a most perilous task. I understand if you do not wish to..."
"What do we do after she shows up?"
"What follows is simple... You are to destroy the keystone."
"Indeed. Without the keystone the barrier will weaken, and Magatsu will soon revive."
"...But that is what we want. You must have faith, and leave the consequences to me."
